rules_text:
Creatures you control get Lurk {2} until end of turn. [i](creatures you control can’t be blocked unless defending player pays {2} for each of those creatures.)[/i]
Elicit Sorcery {1}{U}{U} [i](You may cast this as a Sorcery instead of as a Sorcery Creature for {1}{U}{U}, putting it into the graveyard as it resolves.)[/i]
{3}{U}{U}: This creature can’t be blocked this turn.

OG_2:
Creatures you control get “this creature can’t be blocked unless defending player pays 2” until end of turn.
Elicit Sorcery 1UU (You may cast this as a Sorcery spell for 1UU, Removing its other spell types and effects.)
3UU: MV7 Dragger of Depths can’t be blocked this turn.

OG_1:

Until the beginning of your next turn, nonland permanents your opponents control have “you can’t untap this permanent unless you pay 2”

Elicit Sorcery 2UU (You may cast this as a Sorcery spell for 2UU, Removing its other spell types and effects.)
3UU: UU06 MV7 Dragger of Depths can’t be blocked this turn.
